title: Texas Public Information Act Request: Body-Worn and Dash Camera Footage – Arrest of Keyonna Desirhae Lane (November 18, 2024)

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Texas Public Information Act Request: Body-Worn and Dash Camera Footage – Arrest of Keyonna Desirhae Lane (November 18, 2024)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act (Texas Government Code, Chapter 552), I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) and vehicle dash camera footage related to the arrest of Keyonna Desirhae Lane on or about November 18, 2024, by the Garland Police Department.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by any Garland Police Department personnel during the investigation, detention, pursuit (if applicable), and arrest of Keyonna Desirhae Lane.

All dash camera footage from any patrol vehicles involved in the investigation, pursuit, or detention.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the arrest occurred around 12:00 AM, I request responsive footage from approximately 10:30 PM on November 17, 2024, to 2:30 AM on November 18, 2024.

I respectfully request that the footage be provided in its original recorded form wherever legally permissible, with only the minimum redactions necessary under Texas law to preserve the full and accurate depiction of the events.

If any footage is withheld or redacted, please provide a written explanation identifying the specific statutory exemption relied upon for each redaction or withholding.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

communications.subject: Garland Police Department - Records Request Confirmation PD-2025-2654
communications.communication:
Dear Requestor,  
   
 Thank you for submitting a Police Department Information Request on Monday, April 28, 2025.  
   
 Your request reference number is Request Number: PD-2025-2654 and your security key is D5F17580.  
 Please have both reference numbers available when communicating with our staff regarding your request. 
   
 Thank you,  
   
   
 Garland Police Department 
 1891 Forest Lane
Garland, TX 75042 
 GPDPIARequests@Garlandtx.gov

 Powered by

communications.subject: RE: Texas Public Information Act Request #PD-2025-2654
communications.communication:
Dear Garland Police Department,

Thank you for your email. The date of birth for Keyonna Desirhae Lane is January 6, 2001.

Please let me know if any further information is required to process my request. I look forward to your response.

Sincerely,
Police Cam News

communications.subject: Garland Police Department - Records Request PD-2025-2654 No Responsive Information
communications.communication:
RE: Records Request PD-2025-2654 - Submitted On: 4/28/2025 
 Dear Requestor, 
 Thank you for your inquiry regarding specific information under the Texas Public Information Act. After conducting a thorough investigation based on the details provided, we regret to inform you that we were unable to locate any records that match your request. 
  
 For further assistance, please contact our office Monday through Friday, 8:00am to 5:00pm, 972-205-1691. 
  
 Garland Police Department 
 1891 Forest Lane
Garland, Texas 75042 
 GPDPIARequests@Garlandtx.gov 
 (972) 205-1657 
 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 Powered by

communications.subject: RE: Texas Public Information Act Request #PD-2025-2654
communications.communication:
Thank you for your response. Below is all the information I have on Keyonna Desirhae Lane:

Full Name: Keyonna Desirhae Lane

Date of Birth: January 6, 2001

Arrest Date: Likely November 17, 2024 (Booking time listed as 12:00 AM on November 18, 2024)

Arrest Time: Around 12:00 AM

Arresting Agency: Garland Police Department (GPD)

Bond: $1,500

Charges:

Theft in Property equal to $100 or less than $750

Theft Property >= $750 < $2,500

Theft Property >= $2,500 < $30K

Unlawful use of criminal instrument

Evading Arrest Detention

Theft Property >= $750 < $2,500

Suspect Address: 3700 Gus Thomasson Rd, Mesquite, TX 75150

Physical Description:

Height: 5'11"

Weight: 215 lbs

Hair Color: Red or Auburn

Eye Color: Brown

Please check again for any available body-worn or dash camera footage related to this incident. If no records are found, I kindly request a formal Non-Responsive Documents Report or equivalent statement as required by the Texas Public Information Act.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your response.
